column1: #text=It had been a while since I had gotten a hair cut and decided it was time .
#text=I found the number of the salon in the phone book and called to make an appointment .
#text=My favorite stylist was there and she greeted me and had me sit down in a chair that was in her booth .
#text=She wrapped a plastic protector over me and bent the chair back .
#text=Then she combed my hair to get it ready to be cut .
#text=Then she started cutting my hair with a special pair of scissors .
#text=She took her time about cutting my hair .
#text=When she was all done she grabbed a hair dryer and dried it .
#text=I thanked her and went to the counter to pay .
#text=I paid , left the shop and drove home .
